summary: Documents the preparation and rehearsals for Sting's first solo concert, as well as his supporting band's opinions on their leader and his controversial efforts.
cast: Miles A. Copeland III|Gil Friesen|Vic Garbarini|Omar Hakim|Darryl Jones|Kenny Kirkland|Branford Marsalis|Dolette McDonald|Janice Pendarvis|Lou Salvatore|Sting|Trudie Styler|Jake Sumner|Kim Turner|Kim Turner|Max Vadukul|Michael Apted
title: Bring on the Night
